page.title: 14CALLESTICK PEOPLE, TRURO.
page.content: The population of Callestick includes farmers,a builder, a doctor, solicitor and several retired people. One retired gentleman's time is fully occupied caring for his \ acre garden growing flowers, fruit and vegetables enough for his family, and by D.I.Y. maintenance on the attractive old stone house:never-ending re-decoration & repairs, "like the Forth Bridge". He enjoys weekly lunch with Perranzabuloe Rotary Club, occasionally goes to the Plume of Feathers pub or out for a meal with his wife (teacher in Truro). They go to Church at Perranzabuloe. He enjoys an extended lunch-hour, reading newspapers, and watches television in the evening. This month he has chopped wood from a neighbour's dead elm trees for open fires during the winter & has bought sausages & bacon in bulk from a factory to store in the deep-freeze.
